name: PythonPunk
tagline: PythonPunk is a text-based python game(PRE-BETA very un-stable)
body:
PythonPunk is a text-based RP game currently being developed by Nathan Stevens(A.K.A TheTechPunk). Goal -------------- To make a game that is free to all to enjoy Lore ------------- Comming Soon You may ------------- * Enjoy this game! * Edit for enjoyment You may NOT -------------- * Use game or code for anything outside of personal enjoyment * Use for profit * Edit and claim as own or claim in general
This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs 3.0 Unported License.
